name: getChannel
description:
Zoom chat [channels](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/200912909-Getting-Started-With-Channels-Group-Messaging-) allow users to communicate via chat in private or public groups. Use this API to get information about a specific channel. **Scope:** `chat_channel:read:admin`
**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `Medium`

Note: For an account-level OAuth app, this API can only be used on behalf of a user who is assigned with a role that has View or Edit permission for Chat Channels.

channelId.description: Channel ID: Unique Identifier of a channel.

userId.description: Unique identifier of the user who is the owner of the channel.

$block: The channel object represents a Zoom chat [channel](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/200912909-Getting-Started-With-Channels-Group-Messaging-).

$ul: **type**: Type of the channel. The value can be one of the following:
